attributes.action: Stop all heavy goods vehicles from using the roads between 7.00am and 7.00pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will result in less congestion during peak times. All HGVs must deliver when the roads are less congested.

rejection.details: Similar petitions already exist http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Slow-vehicles/ & http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Deliveries/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
